00025 class Vector {
00026   public:
00027 
00028     //----------  management  ----------
00029 
00030     //  constructor: given a pointer to double, interprets it as n-dimensional vector 
00031     //  defaults are n = Vector::DefaultDim, A = 0; they are set in the implementation,
00032     //  because they must be defined after Vector::DefaultDim
00033     Vector (unsigned n, double *A); 
00034     Vector (unsigned n, double, ... );         
00035 
00036     ~Vector (void);                                   //  destructor
00037 
00038     //  copy constructor: makes a deep copy, if deep == true, else a shallow one
00039     Vector (const Vector &X, bool deep = true);
00040 
00041     Vector &operator= (const Vector &Y);              // assignment operator
00042 
00043     static unsigned GetDefaultDim (void);
00044     static void SetDefaultDim (unsigned d);
00045 
00046     //----------  validity    ----------
00047 
00048     operator bool  (void) const;                      // true if valid, false if not
00049     bool operator! (void) const;                      // false if valid, true if not
00050       
00051     //  ownership concept:
00052     bool owner (void) const;                          // true if object is owner of data
00053 
00054     void invalidate (void);                           //  invalidates an object, destroying data if owner
00055 
00056     //----------  access      ----------
00057 
00058     //  operator [] returns a reference to component i (no boundary checking!)
00059     double &operator[] (unsigned i);
00060 
00061     //  operator [] const returns component i (read-only access, no check)
00062     double operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00063 
00064     unsigned dimension (void) const;
00065 
00066     //----------  arithmetics ----------
00067 
00068     Vector &operator+= (const Vector &Y);
00069     Vector &operator-= (const Vector &Y);
00070     Vector &operator*= (const double &s);
00071 
00072     Vector operator- (void) const;
00073     Vector operator+ (const Vector &Y);
00074     Vector operator- (const Vector &Y);
00075     Vector operator* (const double &s);
00076     double operator* (const Vector &X);
00077     Vector operator/ (const double &s);
00078 
00079     bool operator== (const Vector &Y);
00080     bool operator!= (const Vector &Y);
00081 
00082     double sqnorm (void);
00083     double norm (void);
00084     Vector normalize (void);
00085 
00086     double *data () { return x; }
00087 
00088   private:
00089     static unsigned DefaultDim; 
00090 
00091     unsigned dim;
00092     double *x; 
00093     bool own; };
00094  
00095 ostream &operator << (ostream &, const Vector &);
00096 istream &operator >> (istream &, Vector &);
00097 
00098 Vector cross (const Vector &, const Vector &);

00103 //------------  Vector member functions
00104 
00105     //  ------------  management  ------------
00106 
00107 inline Vector::Vector (unsigned n = Vector::DefaultDim, double *A = 0): 
00108     dim (n), x (A ? A : new double [n]), own (A? false: true) { } //  implicitly initialized to zero vector
00109   
00110 inline Vector::~Vector (void) { if (own) delete [] x; }
00111   
00112     //----------  validity    ----------     
00113 
00114 inline Vector::operator bool  (void) const { return  dim; }
00115 inline bool Vector::operator! (void) const { return !dim; }
00116 
00117 inline void Vector::invalidate (void) {
00118   if (own) delete [] x;
00119   x = 0;
00120   dim = 0; }
00121 
00122     //----------  access      ----------
00123 
00124 inline double &Vector::operator[] (unsigned i) { 
00125   return x[i]; }                                                  //  no boundary checking!
00126 
00127 inline double Vector::operator[] (unsigned i) const { 
00128   return x[i]; }                                                  //  -''- !
00129                                                                   //  valgrind: "Use of uninitialised value of size 8"
00130                                                                   //  at Vector::operator[](unsigned int) const (numclass.H:128)
00131 
00132 inline unsigned Vector::dimension (void) const { return dim; }
00133 
00134 inline unsigned Vector::GetDefaultDim (void) { return DefaultDim; }
00135 inline void Vector::SetDefaultDim (unsigned d) { DefaultDim = d; }
00136 
00137 
00138     //----------  arithmetics ----------
00139 
00140 inline Vector &Vector::operator+= (const Vector &Y) {
00141   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i] ; 
00142   return *this; }
00143 
00144 inline Vector &Vector::operator-= (const Vector &Y) {
00145   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i] ; 
00146   return *this; }
00147 
00148 inline Vector &Vector::operator*= (const double &s) {             //  scalar multiplication
00149   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) x[i] *= s ;
00150   return *this; }
00151 
00152 inline Vector Vector::operator- (void) const {
00153   static Vector Z;
00154   Z = *this;
00155   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ; 
00156   return Z; }
00157 
00158 inline Vector Vector::operator+ (const Vector &Y) {
00159   static Vector Z;
00160   Z = *this;
00161   return (Z += Y); }
00162 
00163 inline Vector Vector::operator- (const Vector &Y) {
00164   static Vector Z;
00165   Z = *this;
00166   return (Z -= Y); }
00167 
00168 inline Vector Vector::operator* (const double &s) {               //  scalar multiplication
00169   /*static*/ Vector Z;
00170   Z = *this;
00171   return Z *= s; }
00172 
00173 inline double Vector::operator* (const Vector &Y) {               //  dot product
00174   double dot = 0.;
00175   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++)
00176     if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];                 //  valgrind barks "Use of uninitialised value of size 8"
00177                                                   //  at Vector::operator*(Vector const &) (numclass.H:174)
00178   return dot; }
00179 
00180 inline Vector Vector::operator/ (const double &s) {               //  scalar multiplication
00181   return operator* (1./s); }
00182 
00183 inline bool Vector::operator== (const Vector &Y) {
00184   for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) 
00185     if (x[i] != Y.x[i]) return false;
00186   return true; }
00187 
00188 inline bool Vector::operator!= (const Vector &Y) {
00189   return !operator== (Y); }
00190 
00191 inline double Vector::sqnorm (void) {
00192   return operator* (*this); }
00193 
00194 inline double Vector::norm (void) {
00195     return sqrt (sqnorm ()); }
00196 
00197 inline Vector Vector::normalize (void) {
00198   double n = norm ();
00199   if (n > 0.) return operator* (1./sqrt (n));
00200   else return *this; }
